tasks.label: Run API and UI
tasks.command: Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'cd CarServiceTracking.API; dotnet run'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 3; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'cd CarServiceTracking.UI.Web; dotnet run'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 3; Start-Process 'http://localhost:5070'
